spec_data.Name: perl-Library-CallNumber-LC
spec_data.Description:
This module takes Library of Congress (LC) call numbers and normalizes them so
that they are comparable with each other. This supports sorting and
left-anchored searching, such that searching "A11*" should give you all the A11
call numbers.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:44:39 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Normalize Library of Congress call numbers for sorting
